info.description: This parameter API allows for the retrival and management of parameters stored in AWS parameter store and secrets manager.  This is a demo API for intern Anthony Zhang's to use for his development project.
info.title: Cloud Parameter API

get.summary: Lists the available parameters for this account
get.description:
Returns a list of parameters for this account.
Should call the SSM describe parameters API

get.summary: Lists the available keys in a given store
get.description:
Returns a list of parameters for this account prefixed by /prefix.  
Should recursively return all values under /prefix.  Limitation of
path parameter is that only a single prefix can be submitted, 2 or more
prefixes are not supported paramter /cellsignal/service/foo can only be
queried via /cellsignal.  Should call AWS SSM get-parameters-by-path API

get.summary: Returns the value of the parameter with a given key
get.description:
Returns the value for a given parameter in the parameter store.
Due to the use of a path in the parameter key value, the get method
should use a URL Escaped query parameter. Should call 
AWS SSM get-parameter API
